H0.text: Which South American capital is the nearest to the equator. Bogotá

H1.text: Which South American capital is the nearest to the equator. Lima

H2.text: Which South American capital is the nearest to the equator. Brasília

H3.text: Which South American capital is the nearest to the equator. Qito

A4.text: Quito is the closest capital city to the equator.

A5.text: The equator runs through the northern part of the metropolitan area in the parish of San Antonio.

A6.text: Brasília lies between the parallels 15° S and 20° S
